# buttonAppearance

**Instance Property**

The appearance attributes for plain bar button items in the navigation bar.

## Declaration

```swift
@NSCopying @MainActor var buttonAppearance: UIBarButtonItemAppearance { get set }
```

## Discussion

To configure the appearance of the back or done buttons separately, use the [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UINavigationBarAppearance/backButtonAppearance] and [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UINavigationBarAppearance/doneButtonAppearance] properties instead.
